statement.p: A city's population in the year \displaystyle{x}=1992 was \displaystyle{y}=3,381,200. In 1987 the population was 3,379,450.
Compute the slope of the population growth (or decline) and choose the most accurate statement from the following:

ol.li: The population is decreasing at a rate of 500 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 350 people per year.
The population is decreasing at a rate of 350 people per year.
The population is decreasing at a rate of 550 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 550 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 500 people per year.

ul.li: B: The population is increasing at a rate of 350 people per year.
